name: Jo Bennett
quotes: Well, you're the popular one, aren't you?
Turns out, I can't have children. I can, however, have dogs.
I'm Jolene Bennett, Jo for short. I'm a breast cancer survivor, close personal friends with Nancy Pelosi, and Truman Capote and I slept with three of the same guys.
In the south, we have a saying: If you're too fat, America, I'm not gonna sugarcoat it because you'll probably eat that too.
